遠洋貿易: (えんようぼうえき) - ocean trade; trade by sea
遠流: (おんる) - banishment or exile (punishment under the ritsuryo system)
遠浅: (とおあさ) - shoal; wide shallow beach
遠火: (とおび) - distant fire; fire at some distance (in cooking)
遠点: (えんてん) - far point (farthest point at which an object can be brought into focus by the eye); {astron}  apoapsis
遠眼: (えんがん) - farsightedness; hyperopia; hypermetropia; far-sightedness
遠眼鏡: (えんがんきょう) - spectacles for far-sightedness; telescope
遠称: (えんしょう) - distal pronoun (indicating distance from both speaker and listener, i.e. are, asoko, achira)
遠見: (とおみ) - looking into distance; watchtower; distant view
遠視: (えんし) - farsightedness; far-sightedness; hyperopia; hypermetropia; long-sightedness
遠謀深慮: (えんぼうしんりょ) - (yoji) deep design and forethought; farsighted and deeply-laid plan
遠距離分解能: (えんきょりぶんかいのう) - far surface resolution
遠距離恋愛: (えんきょりれんあい) - long distance relationship
遠近: (おちこち) - distance; perspective; far and near; here and there
遠近両用メガネ: (えんきんりょうようメガネ) - bifocal glasses; bifocals
遠退き弧: (とおのきこ) - arc of recess (of a gear)
遠退き角: (とおのきがく) - angle of recess (of a gear)
遠退く: (とおのく) - to become distant; to recede
遠退ける: (とおのける) - to keep (someone) at a distance
遠道: (とおみち) - long walk; roundabout way
遠遠しい: (とおどおしい) - distant (behavior, etc.); reserved
遠郊: (えんこう) - area remote from the city; outlying area
遠隔アクセス: (えんかくアクセス) - remote access
遠隔アクセスデータ処理: (えんかくアクセスデータしょり) - remote-access data processing
遠隔ジョブ入力: (えんかくジョブにゅうりょく) - remote job entry; RJE
遠隔バッチ入力: (えんかくバッチにゅうりょく) - remote batch entry
遠隔バッチ処理: (えんかくバッチしょり) - remote batch processing
遠隔一括入力: (えんかくいっかつにゅうりょく) - remote batch entry
遠隔一括処理: (えんかくいっかつしょり) - remote batch processing
遠隔保守システム: (えんかくほしゅシステム) - ASSIST; Advanced Service Support Information System Technology
遠隔医療: (えんかくいりょう) - remote medicine
遠隔地: (えんかくち) - distant land; remote location; distant province
遠隔操作: (えんかくそうさ) - remote control; remote operation
遠隔操作サービス要素: (えんかくそうさサービスようそ) - Remote Operation Service Element
遠隔操作プロトコル機械: (えんかくそうさプロトコルきかい) - remote-operation-protocol-machine
遠隔教育: (えんかくきょういく) - distance learning; remote learning
遠隔測定: (えんかくそくてい) - telemetry; remote measurement
遠隔端末装置: (えんかくたんまつそうち) - remote terminal
遠隔試験法: (えんかくしけんほう) - remote test method
遠離: (おんり) - separation by a great distance; (おんり only) detachment
遠駆け: (とおがけ) - long gallop or horseride
遠鳴り: (とおなり) - distant peals (thunder); distant roar (sea)
遡る: (sakanoboru) - to go upstream; to go back (com o tempo, à origem), to date back to, to trace back to, to make retroactive
遡上: (そじょう) - going upstream; retroact; retrospect
遡求権: (そきゅうけん) - right of recourse; right for redemption
遡河魚: (さっかぎょ) - anadromous fish (fish that migrates upstream, e.g. salmon)
遡源: (そげん) - returning to the origin; going back to the beginning; retracing
遡航: (そこう) - going upstream; sailing against the current
遡行: (そこう) - going upstream; sailing against the current
遣い: (つかい) - errand/mission/going as envoy; messenger/bearer/errand boy/errand girl; familiar spirit; (often read as づかい when used as a suffix)  use/usage/user/trainer/tamer/charmer
遣い出: (つかいで) - lasting quality; good wearing ability; going a long way
遣い切る: (つかいきる) - to use up; to exhaust; to wear out
遣い手: (つかいて) - user/consumer/employer; master (e.g. of swordsmanship); prodigal/spendthrift
遣い捨てる: (つかいすてる) - to use and then throw away
遣い方: (つかいかた) - way to use something; treatment; management (of help)
遣い果す: (つかいはたす) - to use up; to squander
遣い果たす: (つかいはたす) - to use up; to squander
遣い物: (つかいもの) - (usu. in the negative)  useful thing/usable article; (遣い物 only) present/gift
遣う: (つかう) - to use (a thing, method, etc.)/to make use of/to put to use; to use (a person, animal, puppet, etc.)/to employ/to handle/to manage/to manipulate; to use (time, money, etc.)/to spend/to consume; to use (language)/to speak
遣える: (つかえる) - to be usable; to be serviceable; to be useful
遣す: (よこす) - to send/to forward; to hand over (e.g. money)
遣っつける: (やっつける) - to beat; to attack (an enemy); to do away with; to finish off
遣ってみる: (やってみる) - to have a go; to try and do (something); to take a chance with something
遣って来る: (やってくる) - to come along/to come around/to turn up; to arrive at the present/to get where one is/to have been doing something (for a period of time)
